sub_title: Digitally transforming the shipping industry | Product and Project Manager for Asset Productivity & Cargo Visibility | Management & Operations Consulting | MBA & Engineer | Corporate & Startup
summary:
I am an 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐌𝐁𝐀 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐫 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 10 𝐲𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐬 of versatile experience in 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐅𝐏&𝐀 / 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 across a range of industries, including 𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐨 𝐚𝐢𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬, 𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲, 𝐫𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐥, 𝐩𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐚, 𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬, 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐮𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 / 𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠. Additionally, I have experience working with startups, having remotely advised a medical devices startup in Argentina during its bootstrapping phase and working at South Summit (Spain Startup).

Strong in 𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐬𝐢𝐬, 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧, 𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐨𝐟 𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐝𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, engaging with internal and external stakeholders. Proven success in leading teams and managing projects worldwide, delivering strategic consulting and redefining critical processes, enabling digitalization, and helping position businesses for long-term growth with standards and agility. Excellent communication and people skills to lead meetings and workshops. Highly organized, skilled at rising to challenges, with a 𝐩𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐬𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬.

I have a continuous learning approach where I complement my varied work experiences with online courses and certifications. These include API and web services, professional scrum master certification, six sigma green belt certification from PMI, lean operations analytics, distribution channels, financial modeling, blockchain council certification, and distribution & airline retailing with NDC - IATA.

I've worked in Argentina, New Zealand, Chile, Brazil, US, Portugal, Italy, Switzerland, and Spain. Amsterdam based since April 2021. 𝐅𝐥𝐮𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐢𝐧 𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡, 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐬𝐡, 𝐈𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐚𝐧, 𝐂𝐚𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐦𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝐢𝐧 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐠𝐮𝐞𝐬𝐞.

𝐎𝐫𝐠𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: DCSA (MSC, Maersk, CMA CGM, Hapag-Lloyd, ONE, Evergreen, Yang Ming, HMM, and ZIM)
𝐁𝐢𝐠 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐬: Iberdrola, Avangrid, Enel, Repsol, Acciona, Grifols, Schindler, Latam Cargo, Shell
𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐩𝐬: Spain Startup, Dinvent

𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐨𝐟𝐭𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐤𝐧𝐨𝐰𝐥𝐞𝐝𝐠𝐞: Power BI, Power Query, Power Automate, Excel, Access, Project, PowerPoint, Sharepoint, Office 365, Teams, Miro, Visio, Microstrategy, Tableau, Sap, Minitab, Google Analytics (certified), Google Adwords, Google Data Studio (certified), Jira

profile_positions.description:
At Digital Container Shipping Association (DCSA), we’re establishing standards for a common technology foundation that enables global collaboration. Our goal is to make shipping services easy to use, flexible, efficient, reliable, and environmentally friendly. DCSA member carriers include MSC, Maersk, CMA CGM, Hapag-Lloyd, ONE, Evergreen, Yang Ming, HMM, and ZIM.

𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐫 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐀𝐏𝐈𝐬 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Development and definition of Processes, User Stories, Use Cases, Data Attributes, Information Model, Interface Standards, APIs, and Reference implementation.
- Organizing and executing weekly stakeholder meetings and workshops with +20 experts from 9 carriers (+100 total)
- Managing resources, team, timelines, budget, and deliverables
- Identifying and managing potential project risks and mitigation plans
- Assisting in the definition of business case, project scope, and goals
- Communicating with leadership teams and key stakeholders to ensure goal alignment

𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐀𝐏𝐈𝐬 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐲: 

► 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐤 & 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐬 & 𝐀𝐏𝐈 - https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis/dcsaorg/DCSA_TNT/3.0.0-Beta-1
► 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐬 & 𝐀𝐏𝐈 - https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis/dcsaorg/DCSA_OVS/3.0.0-Beta-1#/
► 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐬 (𝐏𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐭𝐨 𝐏𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠) & 𝐀𝐏𝐈: https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis/dcsaorg/DCSA_CS/1.0.0#/
► 𝐁𝐨𝐨𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐅𝐨𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐬 𝐞𝐱𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐬 𝐛𝐞𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐕𝐒𝐀, 𝐒𝐂𝐀 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐕𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐥 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬 & 𝐀𝐏𝐈 - https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis/dcsaorg/DCSA_OBF/1.0.0-Beta-1/
profile_positions.title: Digital Program Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 - Deliver change programs and projects to clients across various industries. Analyse, design and implement solutions to optimize processes, team performance and achieve business objectives while increasing internal and external customer satisfaction. Lead cross-functional teams during solution design and implementation at client site and remotely. Enable clients to grow, optimize, and fundamentally change the quality and pace of business operations, by recommending unique and custom solutions. 

► 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐮𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐫 (Switzerland, Germany, France, Iberia): Engineering centers organizational model analysis and definition of main transformation opportunities to adapt to markets needs.
▷ Interviews inside/outside business units to assess current and alternative models
▷ Data gathering, FTE and Organizational models analysis
▷ Opportunities identification and valuation

► 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐮𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐫 (Italy): Engineering center organizational model analysis and new model definition
▷ Interviews inside/outside business unit to assess current and alternative models (UAE, Hong Kong, Spain)
▷ Data gathering & analysis
▷ Lead workshops with Executives to validate new model
▷ Implementation plan definition

► 𝐑𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐭𝐬 𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐞𝐫 & 𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫: Global Photovoltaic fleet O&M operating model analysis & design to enable 4x growth of installed capacity worldwide (4 GW) --> Italy
▷ Global O&M Model
▷ Operational readiness (business development, construction, commissioning, handover)

► 𝐆𝐥𝐨𝐛𝐚𝐥 𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐝𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐛𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐲 (Spain, US, UK and Brazil): Definition network global transformation program 2020 - 2030
▷ Streams definition (planning, development, O&M, customer experience, digitalizacion), objectives, impacts. 
▷ Governance model & communication plan
▷ Lead of workshops with Executives
profile_positions.title: Senior Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
► 𝐑𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐭𝐬 𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐞𝐫 & 𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫 (US): 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐟𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐬 𝐟𝐥𝐞𝐞𝐭 𝐎&𝐌 𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐦𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐬𝐢𝐬, 𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 (𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐝 𝐜𝐚𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐭𝐲 > 2300 𝐌𝐖)
▷ Maintenance operations assessment in plants across the US
▷ Cross-departments workshops lead for designing solutions, processes and tools
▷ Plant Managers performance model definition and auditing
▷ Implementation and change management across fleet in US leading team of regional change agents
▷ Staff productivity and assets performance enhancement throughout planning and scheduling standardization
▷ Definition and creation of data models and dashboards in Power BI to consolidate tools and support roll-out to whole fleet (7000 MW)
▷ Plant Managers Handbook development and publishing
profile_positions.title: Senior Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
► 𝐏𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐚 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐲 (Europe, US, Asia): 𝐆𝐥𝐨𝐛𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 & 𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐬 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐦𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐥 𝐚𝐟𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐌&𝐀
▷ Organizational assessment (customer service, demand planning & procurement, collections, support services, logistics & stock management)
▷ Volumes analysis and numerical studies (orders per division, customer commonality, S&OP accuracy, stocks, GST timings)
▷ Case studies (customer service centralization, transport costs potential optimization, warehouses localization, inventory scrap avoidance)
▷ Main processes assessment (Planning end to end customer delivery, planning to distributor & affiliate delivery)

► 𝐎𝐢𝐥 & 𝐄𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐲 (Spain): 𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐦𝐞𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐝𝐬’ 𝐜𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐬 𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐨𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 leading +30 workshops
▷ Lead +30 workshops to redesign loyalty card & payment cards processes (signup, claims, sign off, resume signup, recapture clients, etc)

► 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐫𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐲 (Spain & Global): 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐬 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧

► 𝐎𝐢𝐥 & 𝐄𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐲 (Global) : 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐨𝐟 𝐈𝐓 𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐞, coaching and evaluating behaviour, processes & strategy alignment for Oil & Energy Company
▷ Coaching on role adoption and strategy alignment, Evaluation of behaviors
▷ Auditing processes compliance

► 𝐂𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐬 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐲 (Spain, Portugal): 𝐏𝐌𝐎 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 to fast track and prioritize portfolio of projects in several industrial complexes

profile_positions.description:

Dinvent MED was a startup in the R+D field looking to develop medical devices to improve the capacities of health professionals and institutions. Dinvent MED, in bootstrapping phase, developed the first product prototipe and pitched the startup to different funding programs within Argentina. Dinvent MED was selected selected amongst hundred of startups to participate in the NAVES program of IAE Business School & Banco Macro.

profile_positions.title: Program & Speakers Relations - MBA Internship

profile_positions.description:
► Generated retail unit results statements and controlled sales (Volume 1.7B Liters), commissions ($47MM) and Opex ($2.7MM) vs. budget with focus in commissions and supporting results improvement. Prepared KPIs, implemented Power BI dashboards and enhanced budget process. 
► Led a team of 3 analysts and field technicians, managing contracts and Salesforce reports, and supporting area managers and franchisees.
► Conducted network and businesses mix profitability analysis (B2C: fuel, convenience stores, carwash and lubricants; B2B: Shell card).
► Designed and implemented new franchises commission model for +350 gas stations and convenience stores; boosting sales, standardizing costs management and negotiation with external business partners, resulting in cost savings of $1MM/year. 
► Coordinated migration project of +100 gas stations ($1,5MM Capex) to new online stock management and sales system dealing with logistics and agenda of project stakeholders. Prepared business cases for new migrations. 
► Created collaborative SharePoint List database of stations network with owners, providing up to date data for analysis cross company. 
► Prepared and presented the annual budget
